directions: In a large, heavy skillet, saute onions in butter or margarine over medium heat.  Add meat, and cook until browned.
Mix in mustard, Worcestershire sauce, vinegar, salt, pepper, and ketchup.  Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until sauce coats the meat. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 pound sirloin, cut into 1 inch cubes
title: Barbecued Beef Cubes or Hamburger
